original_text: They shall not make bald patches on their heads, nor shave off the edges of their beards, nor make any cuts on their body.
korean_text: 제사장들은 머리털을 깎아 대머리 같게 하지 말며 자기의 수염 양쪽을 깎지 말며 살을 베지 말고

sentences.original_text: They shall not make bald patches on their heads
nor shave off the edges of their beards
nor make any cuts on their body
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 몸에 어떤 상처도 내지 못한다
